content: WASHINGTON  Dec 8 The U.S. Air Force's top space official on Tuesday slammed a new ground control system for GPS satellites being built by Raytheon Co as "a disaster" and said the Pentagon planned "significant" changes with the company to address the issues.

name: Harris Corporation

content: CALGARY  Alberta  July 14 Suncor Energy Inc  has launched a pilot project to replace the high-pressure steam used to extract bitumen from oil sands with radio frequency technology developed by U.S. defence contractor Harris Corporation.
name: Harris Corporation
title: Suncor oil sands project aims to replace steam with radio waves

title: Harris aims to stay agile through continued high R&D investment

content: NEW YORK  March 10 U.S. aerospace company Exelis Inc is close to unveiling a low-altitude surveillance system for drones  the latest sign of how a "highway in the sky" is likely to evolve.
name: Harris Corporation
title: RPT-INSIGHT-Exelis to offer drone-tracking system as industry  NASA seek to ease safety fears

content: Feb 6 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2105 GMT on Friday:
name: Harris Corporation
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: Harris Corp said on Friday it would buy Exelis Inc in a deal valued at about $4.75 billion  potentially kicking off a long-expected consolidation of mid-tier suppliers to the U.S. military after years of declining defense budgets.
name: Harris Corporation
title: U.S. defense suppliers Harris and Exelis to combine

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 6 Harris Corp does not expect the U.S. government to raise  any major antitrust concerns about its acquisition of fellow Pentagon supplier Exelis Inc  the company's chief executive said Friday.
name: Harris Corporation
title: Harris CEO sees no major antitrust concerns on Exelis deal

content: * Represents premium of about 34 pct to Exelis' Thursday close

title: UPDATE 4-U.S. defense suppliers Harris and Exelis to combine

content: NEW YORK  Feb 6 Morgan Stanley is sole lead arranger of the $3.4 billion  364-day bridge loan slated to back government communications and information technology company Harris Corp's acquisition of Exelis Inc  sources told Thomson Reuters LPC.
name: Harris Corporation
title: TRLPC: Morgan Stanley leads Harris $3.4B bridge loan for Exelis buy

content: WASHINGTON  Feb 6 Harris Corp's acquisition of Exelis Inc will result in some integration costs continuing through fiscal 2016  but savings from consolidating headquarters and other measures will begin to emerge that year  Chief Executive William Brown said.
name: Harris Corporation
title: Harris sees integration costs from Exelis  savings later

content: Feb 6 Communications equipment maker Harris Corp  said it would buy defense contractor Exelis Inc  in a cash-and-stock deal valued at about $4.75 billion.
name: Harris Corporation
title: Communications gear maker Harris to buy defense contractor Exelis
